mapper.select: select mealno, mealpic, mealkcal, mealname, mealtype, date, confirm, day from memb_manage where date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and trano=#{trainingNo}
select m.name, p.titl, tt.tno from memb m inner join tcher_trainer tt on tt.mno = m.mno inner join promotion p on tt.pno = p.pno where tt.trano=#{trainerNo}

select t.*, m.name, p.titl, i.pimg from tcher_trainer t inner join memb m on t.tno = m.mno inner join promotion p on t.pno = p.pno inner join promotionimg i on t.pno = i.pno where t.mno = #{no} and i.titlepic = 1 order by t.sdt desc;

select t.*, m.name, p.titl, i.pimg from tcher_trainer t inner join memb m on t.mno = m.mno inner join promotion p on t.pno = p.pno inner join promotionimg i on t.pno = i.pno where t.tno = #{no} and i.titlepic = 1 order by t.sdt desc;
mapper.insert: insert into memb_manage(mealtype, mealpic, mealkcal, mealname, date, day, confirm, trano) values(#{mealtype}, #{mealpicture}, #{mealkcal}, #{mealname}, curdate(), #{day}, 0, #{trainingNo})
